name: Ticking Stars
description:
Hotel vacancy. Roomba collection bin. Jamba Juice lobby.

This place is no different: a vacuum for transients, dementia out-patients, and the sleep deprived. 

Romance Life, talk to spiders, and lose your mind. Can you break out of the endless cycle of memories, dreams and thoughts?  Attempt to answer the unanswerable and discover yourself.

9 possible endings.

Thank you to my brother, Joe Harris, for designing the awesome thumbnail.

*This game was made for inkJam2021 using the theme: "You'll think of something."

Please leave a comment! Let me know your thoughts, the ending(s) you received, and any typos or major errors I might've made.
